thread.title: Aamir Khan’s Dangal To Be Screened In Parliament For MPs!
thread.title_full: Aamir Khan’s Dangal To Be Screened In Parliament For MPs!

title: Aamir Khan’s Dangal To Be Screened In Parliament For MPs!
text:
» Aamir Khan’s Dangal To Be Screened In Parliament For MPs! Aamir Khan’s Dangal To Be Screened In Parliament For MPs! Aamir Khan starrer Dangal to be screened in the Parliament for MPs on March 23 in an effort to spread the message of women empowerment. Published:   17:36   
Aamir Khan starrer Dangal will be screened in the Parliament for all MPs on March 23rd in an effort to spread the message of women empowerment to the highest ranking officials of our Indian government. The movie will be screened at the initiative of Lok Sabha Speaker Sumita Mahajan and will take place in the Parliament's 'Balayogi auditorium'.Also Read: Hot! Julie 2 Star Raai Laxmi Flaunts Her First Look In A Bikini! Secretary General of Lok Sabha, Anoop Mishra was quoted as saying, "It is my privilege to inform you that the Speaker has desired that popular Hindi film Dangal be screened for the Members of both Houses on Thursday, March 23 at 18.30 hrs. I would be grateful if could kindly make it convenient to grace the occasion along with your spouse." The event is being organised by the Welfare Department of the Lok Sabha Secretariat. "The objective is to send across the message of women empowerment so that the law makers can promote it in their respective constituencies," said a senior official from the department.In 2016, the play Chanakya was staged for the MPs and this time it's Dangal. Aamir Khan and the girls would surely be happy after hearing this news! Also, we hope that the MPs learn a lesson or two about women empowerment and do the right thing necessary to support the cause.
